attributes.action: Create Legislation to allow TEMPORARY DISABLED PARKING BADGES to be issued .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people each day suffer injuries which render them incapable of walking, such as fractured limbs.  They are often
confined to wheelchairs or crutches for
long periods of time, although their injuries are not permanent. I petition
the Government to allow hospitals or GPs to issue Temporary Disabled Parking badges to people in this position. Currently only PERMANENT contitions qualify for the BLUE BADGE DISABLED PARKING SCHEME. Injuries can happen to anyone,so this COULD affect you.
